snippet: Sri Lanka is failing to investigate atrocities that government forces are accused of committing in defeating a Tamil insurgency, the United Nations said Wednesday.
abstract: United Nations says Sri Lanka is failing to investigate atrocities that government forces are accused of committing in defeating Tamil insurgency, and activists and opposition politicians are still being killed or abducted.
lead_paragraph: Sri Lanka is failing to investigate atrocities that government forces are accused of committing in defeating a Tamil insurgency, the United Nations said Wednesday.
